name: insubordinately
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you are not willing to obey orders from people in authority: When I questioned her, she insubordinately replied that it was none of my business. She was dismissed from her job after speaking insubordinately to a senior manager.
More examplesFewer examplesHe insubordinately ignored the captain's instructions.If any member of my team behaves insubordinately, I always insist on a formal, written apology.The boys were warned about their behaviour after they spoke insubordinately to their teacher.
